title: Can't login or access support.riotgames.com
body:
My client was working fine yesterday but I can't log in anymore today. It gets stuck at 'Authenticating' every time and after pressing log in the second time, all the buttons just become unclickable. (Screenshot: https://s28.postimg.org/b2vojm7y5/Screenshot_6.png )

I gave up after trying the same thing for 15 times so  I tried to access riot's support website to submit a ticket but it's also inaccessible, while every other website is still working.  (Screenshot: https://s8.postimg.org/6cwvhj01h/Screenshot_4.png )

I tried the 'Initiate full repair' included with the client, but it said failed to repair and the link provided is also inaccessible. 

I tried turning off firewall/anti-virus, still no use. 

I also tried logging in on my mac, and the same thing happens. 

Can someone pls help {{item:3070}}

ps: oops forgot to highlight my username before and got deleted {{item:3151}}

edit: ok I tried using my hotspot to log in and it worked. but if i switch back to wifi, it just stops working again.

replies.body: Your network might have some block or setting that's preventing you from reaching our authentication or other services.  Try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help make sure your connection can reach us.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help auto configure your firewall settings.  Let me know if that helps!

hey Porocles, no idea why but this message only popped up on my notification bar just then. 

so after a week of no stop restarting client, it suddenly just fixed by itself. I don't know if this will happen again or not since it already happened 4 times already. I changed my dns thing and there haven't been any issue since then. Thanks for the help and I'll submit a new forum if it happens again.
